HomePage.slide3_title: A reliable partner for your business growth

About.title: About Us
About.subtitle: We are a leading trade and distribution company specializing in the import and sale of a wide range of products throughout Tajikistan
About.values_text: Commitment to quality service, building customer trust, and continuous development. We pride ourselves on being a leader and reliable partner, contributing to the availability of the best products for businesses and the population of Tajikistan.
About.footer_text: Today, Capital-T is a modern, dynamically developing company with great potential and prospects.

Stats.years_text: we serve cities and districts throughout Tajikistan
Stats.branches_title: Branches with warehouse and sales team

Partners.title: Partners and Clients
Partners.subtitle: Our portfolio includes globally recognized brands whose products are successfully promoted in our market.

News.title: News
News.featured_p1: 'CAPITAL-T' is one of the largest distribution companies in the territory of the Republic of Tajikistan...
News.featured_p2: Since 2000, LLC 'CAPITAL-T' has begun rapid development...

News.single_p2: Since 2000, LLC 'CAPITAL-T' has begun rapid development...
News.single_p3: The company exists, contributing to the development of individual customers and the provision of quality supply...

News.footer_note: Today, Capital-T is a modern, dynamically developing company with great potential and prospects.

Jobs.about_desc: We are a rapidly growing manufacturer of hand and laundry soaps, as well as washing powders. Our goal is to provide customers with high-quality products that make their lives more comfortable and cleaner.
Jobs.search_desc: We are looking for an energetic and goal-oriented leader! Join our team if you possess the following qualities:
qualities_list: Leadership skills and the ability to motivate a team.
Ability to make quick decisions and solve problems.
Result-oriented mindset and focus on customer service.
Readiness to work in a highly competitive environment.
expectations_list: 2+ years of experience in a supervisor position.
Knowledge of Dushanbe and DRS markets.
duties_list: Leading and coordinating the sales representatives team.
Setting goals and tasks for employees.
Developing and implementing effective sales strategies.
Analyzing sales data and market trends.
Monitoring sales targets and KPI performance.
offers_list: Salary and bonuses above the Tajikistan market average.
Compensation for travel and mobile communication expenses.
Jobs.important_desc: Working in this position requires high determination and readiness for a competitive environment. We are looking for result-oriented individuals ready for challenges.
